collectUserOrder() - Method in class pizza.endpoint.PizzaClient
Collects order information from the user
ConfirmationItem - Class in pizza.message
Represents one line item on an order confirmation, including a short description of the item, the quantity ordered, and its price.

The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

Price:<itemPrice>, description:<itemDescription>
-- all on a single line.
ConfirmationItem(String, double) - Constructor for class pizza.message.ConfirmationItem
Creates a new ConfirmationItem.
ConfirmationItemTest - Class in pizza.message
Tests that a ConfirmationItem object correctly contains and returns data, and that its representation is correct
ConfirmationItemTest() - Constructor for class pizza.message.ConfirmationItemTest
 
ConfirmationMessage - Class in pizza.message
Itemized total bill for a pizza order, including a description and price of each item in the order plus sales tax and total.

The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

4
<Representation of first confirmation item>
...
<Representation of last confirmation item>
(Empty line)
Sales tax: <sales tax amount>
Order total amount: <total amount>
END
See documentation of ConfirmationItem for its representation.
ConfirmationMessage() - Constructor for class pizza.message.ConfirmationMessage
Creates a new, empty ConfirmationMessage
ConfirmationMessageTest - Class in pizza.message
Tests the ConfirmationMessag sent by a PizzaServer
ConfirmationMessageTest() - Constructor for class pizza.message.ConfirmationMessageTest
 
connection - Variable in class pizza.endpoint.PizzaClient
Represents the connection to the PizzaServer
